email.subject: Reminder: Mail your absentee ballot request
email.body_template:
Hey $!firstName,

Congrats. You’re on your way to getting an absentee ballot. We’ve linked your request form here. Remember to download it in the next 7 days before the form expires. All you have to do is print, sign, and mail it to your election office. That address is in the letter we attached above. You’re welcome.

Check out Skimm2020.com for more election info. We've got you covered with all the nonpartisan info and tools you need to vote confidently, no matter how or where you cast your ballot. Plus sign up here for more news from theSkimm.

Happy voting,
theSkimm
